means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 斯诺鲍尔绰号，黑发中一处白发或白斑，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“雪球”(snowball)

sentence.Network_en: All this publicity has had a snowball effect on the sales of their latest album.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有这些宣传对他们最新唱片的销售产生了一种滚雪球效应。

sentence.Network_en: Tom turned the other cheek when he was hit with a snowball.
sentence.Network_cn: 汤姆被人用雪球击中时,竟还准备再挨一下.

sentence.Network_en: A snowball knocked his hat off.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个雪球飞来把他的帽子打落在地.

lj.lj_ly: the scheme has a snowball's chance in hell of being accepted.
lj.lj_ls: 这个计划根本就没有希望被采纳。

encyclopedia.content: 音乐游戏OSU！玩家Snowball ID:Snowball 绰号：雪球 游戏方式：鼠标+键盘 / 数位板+键盘 简介：奥地利维也纳的OSU玩家，在世界范围内都有很高的人气，早期擅长打简单难度歌榜，ACC很高，后期鼠标用坏后换使用数位板，实力猛增，Hidden能力绝佳，不喜欢去打特别鬼畜的谱面，打图非常有毅力，喜好是拿#1并且SS。 因为奥地利的时差问题，中国的玩家应该很少能看到他在线w 和中国大陆玩家Ballance有着说不清道不明的基友关系。 OSU履

entry.def: A snowball is a ball of snow. Children often throw snowballs at each other.

entry.tran: (项目、运动等)迅速增长，滚雪球般增长
entry.def: If something such as a project or campaign snowballs, it rapidly increases and grows.

example.ex: From those early days the business has snowballed...
example.tran: 这个企业从早期开始就一直在迅速地发展扩大。

example.ex: The investigation snowballed from there and has since led to several arrests.
example.tran: 从那里开始，调查范围迅速扩大，有几人已经被逮捕。

means.word_mean: 1. plant having heads of fragrant white trumpet-shaped flowers; grows in sandy arid regions
2. ball of ice cream covered with coconut and usually chocolate sauce
3. ball of crushed ice with fruit syrup
4. snow pressed into a ball for throwing (playfully)
1. increase or accumulate at a rapidly accelerating rate

auth_sentence.content: That creates psychological momentum and a so-called snowball effect.
auth_sentence.res_content: That creates psychological momentum and a so-called snowball effect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That creates psychological momentum and a so-called snowball effect.

auth_sentence.content: MR. Snowball: You have to avoid screwing yourself.
auth_sentence.res_content: MR. Snowball: You have to avoid screwing yourself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: MR. Snowball: You have to avoid screwing yourself.

auth_sentence.content: Has he ever heard of "The Snowball Effect".
auth_sentence.res_content: Has he ever heard of "The Snowball Effect".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Has he ever heard of "The Snowball Effect".

sentences.en: A snowball gathers as it rolls.
A snowball knocked his hat off.
sentences.cn: 一个雪球飞来把他的帽子打落在地。

sentences.en: Sabina tried to get him to throw snowballs with her.
sentences.cn: 莎宾娜想让他和她扔雪球玩。

sentences.en: When you squeeze a handful of snow, the flakes cohere to make a snowball.
sentences.cn: 你把一团雪捏紧,雪就黏合成雪球。

sentences.en: The boys were chucking snowballs at passing cars.
sentences.cn: 那些男孩子冲着汽车扔雪球。

sentences.en: They like to press wet snow hard to make snowballs.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢把湿雪捏成雪球。

sentences.en: Tom turned the other cheek when he was hit with a snowball.
sentences.cn: 汤姆被人用雪球击中时,竟还准备再挨一下。

sentences.en: After the boys threw the snowballs they saw a large lady bearing down upon them from across the street.
sentences.cn: 男孩子们投了雪球后,只见对面一个身材高大的妇女冲他们走来。

means.word_mean: 根本不可能(做某事)；机会渺茫

sentences.en: Look at this traffic! I’m afraid we haven’t got a snowball’s chance in hell of getting to the airport in time.
sentences.cn: 看看有多少车！恐怕我们根本没有指望能及时赶到机场。
